title: Life expectancy in North America 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Life expectancy in years on the Y-axis for 3 different Countrys for 2 groups Males, and Females that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Canada had the maximum Life expectancy in years among all 2 groups, and it was for Females. The minimum Life expectancy in years was observed in Country North America for Males.
Country Canada and North America had the biggest gap of 4.0 between the highest and lowest Life expectancy in years found for Males.
On average, the Country Canada had the highest Life expectancy in years for all 2 groups Males, and Females. Whereas North America had the lowest average Life expectancy in years.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Males, and Females. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Life expectancy in years.
Out of all 2 groups, Females had the highest Life expectancy in years for Country Canada and Males had the lowest Life expectancy in years for Country North America.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Life expectancy in years on the Y-axis for 3 different Countrys for 2 groups Males, and Females that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Canada had the maximum Life expectancy in years among all 2 groups, and it was for Females. The minimum Life expectancy in years was observed in Country North America for Males.
Country Canada and North America had the biggest gap of 4.0 between the highest and lowest Life expectancy in years found for Males.
On average, the Country Canada had the highest Life expectancy in years for all 2 groups Males, and Females. Whereas North America had the lowest average Life expectancy in years.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Males, and Females. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Life expectancy in years.
Out of all 2 groups, Females had the highest Life expectancy in years for Country Canada and Males had the lowest Life expectancy in years for Country North America.
Among all the Countrys, Males had the highest Life expectancy in years in Country Canada and lowest Life expectancy in years in Country North America.
Country Canada and North America had the biggest gap of 4.0 between the highest and lowest Life expectancy in years found for Males.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Life expectancy in years was found in case of Males.
Averaging all 2 groups Males, and Females, the Country Canada is the maximum Life expectancy in years and North America is the minimum Life expectancy in years.
